description: Skull cracked with a thrown boomerang by Alice Kojima
Head smashed in with a hammer by Morio Kuki
Stabbed in the chest with a thrown katana by Ayon Kimu
Shot in the back of the head with a shotgun by Morio Kuki
Shot twice in the chest by Shu Ajiki
Shot by Shu Ajiki on his own request
Impaled by falling pieces of wood after being shot in the throat by Shu Ajiki
Shot in the head by Morio Kuki
